short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that allows the user to copy data from one form to another.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will add additional item to the context menu, which will allow you to copy form content and then paste it to another form, keeping track of inputs' types and names. The data is stored in the browser's internal session storage and is discarded after the browser is closed.
